name: Ritual (V 1.01)
description:
Updated to V 1.01 (19-8-2017)
Solve puzzles to complete the dark ritual

Ritual is a point and click adventure game developed in Uruguay at the Winterjam 2017 by Urumonkeys teem.

The game is set in a dark misterious world where you have to solve a puzzle to be able to complete the ritual.
